name: ThunderSleepSounds
0:
”Alexa open thunder sleep sounds”
”Alexa ask thunder sleep sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thunder sleep sounds
des:
A dark rumbling thunder to put you in a deep, deep sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Thunder Sleep Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
